question_details.query: What are the effects of painting gum solutions on rough bark for captive primates?

summary_details.relevant_summary: No evidence was captured for the effects of painting gum solutions on rough bark for primates [1325]. Related actions also had no captured evidence on effects: adding gum solutions to drilled hollow feeders [1326] and providing gum (including artificial gum) [1330].
summary_statements: No evidence was captured for the effects of painting gum solutions on rough bark for primates.
There was no captured evidence on the effects of adding gum solutions to drilled hollow feeders.
There was no captured evidence on the effects of providing gum to primates.
The gum provided to primates can include artificial gum.
